basic.description: An examination of the internal accounting model and related information systems designed to keep the manager informed for the purposes of planning and controlling the organization's operations.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Management Accounting

extra.enrollment_requirement:
NOTE    This course is not open to students enrolled in the Bachelor or Commerce Program.
Prerequisite     Level 2 or above.
Exclusion: COMM212 excludes COMM112.
Prerequisite   COMM111 or COMM211
